leaderNotes.text: Start in basic position. Feet together, shoulders relaxed, maintain good posture.
Step left foot to the side (count 1). Weight on left foot, slight hip movement.
Bring right foot to meet left (count 2). Small step, keep rhythm steady.
Step left foot to the side again (count 3). Emphasize the hip movement.
Tap right foot next to left (count 4). Light tap, no weight transfer.
Now mirror to the right side. Step right foot to the side (count 5).
Bring left foot to meet right (count 6). Keep the movement smooth.
Step right foot to the side (count 7). Focus on leading with your frame.
Tap left foot next to right (count 8). Complete the basic pattern.
Practice the complete 8-count pattern. Left-together-left-tap, right-together-right-tap.

followerNotes.text: Mirror the leader's position. Good posture, relaxed shoulders, ready to follow.
Step right foot to the side (count 1). Mirror the leader - when they go left, you go right.
Bring left foot to meet right (count 2). Follow the rhythm, let hips move naturally.
Step right foot to the side again (count 3). Feel the connection with your partner.
Tap left foot next to right (count 4). Light and quick, maintain balance.
Mirror to the left side. Step left foot to the side (count 5).
Bring right foot to meet left (count 6). Stay connected to the leader's frame.
Step left foot to the side (count 7). Let the leader guide the movement.
Tap right foot next to left (count 8). Finish the pattern with grace.
Practice the mirror pattern. Right-together-right-tap, left-together-left-tap.
